title: Four Hokies named to ACC All-Tournament Team - VT hokiesports.com
content: Four Hokies named to ACC All-Tournament Team  VT hokiesports.com
description: After leading Virginia Tech men's basketball to an ACC Tournament title for the first time in school history, Hunter Cattoor, Keve Aluma, Stormy Murphy and Darius Maddox were named to the ACC's All-Tournament Team Saturday.
